unnormalised: Hey guys, regarding return policies, what's the deal with online shopping? Had a bad experience returning a saree from Fabindia last Diwali. The stitching was off! Even more clarity is needed when you're returning something after buying it during an Onam sale. Makes you want some good Hyderabadi biryani to soothe the frustration, doesn't it?
